abstract: Stocks in United States close higher as hopes grow that deal between Greece and its creditors will allow country to escape defaulting on its loans.
lead_paragraph: Eurozone finance ministers met to discuss the release of bailout funds to Greece in exchange for reforms and said they would reconvene this week.

headline.main: Wall St. Closes Higher on Greek Breakthrough Hopes
headline.print_headline: Hopes for Greece Send Equities Higher

snippet: Eurozone finance ministers met to discuss the release of bailout funds to Greece in exchange for reforms and said they would reconvene this week.
